data.text: @CBCToronto The resolution should be very simple. If a parent chooses not to vaccinate their children that's fine, however if their child dies of Covid then the parents should be charged with a crime. It's no different than withholding life saving treatment for any other medical issue. Done.

@JessMaBi1 @CBCToronto 🙄is right.

Having credentials doesn't make them right, or intelligent. 

Med error and misdiagnosis is one of the top causes of preventable deaths.

Don't forget to ask your doc which brand of cigs they recommend😉 https://t.co/6EteuWuGpO
@CBCToronto Another @stephenharper judicial appointee! Time for a judicial review & appeal!
@Divebutt Reference sources??!!! Are you joking!? Have you been living under a rock???

@JessMaBi1 @CBCToronto Have you seen the 8 pages of horrifying side effects the Pfizer vaccine serves up? Are you keeping up with the data on how damaging this shot is for adults (imagine for developing children)? If CBC is your only source of info, you are being lied to.
@Divebutt @IdontTrustit1 @CBCToronto Did you happen to review the 8 pages of adverse events that was court ordered to be released by Pfzr yesterday?
@Divebutt @CBCToronto Well the judge has ruled that the mom is well within her rights and the kids can make their own decisions.  This sets a huge precedent.
@hay_leeb @CBCToronto you need to read this judgment.  it's amazing
